entry.title: Sunday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of wet flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
